title: Hint
text:
Step 1: Calculate the slope (m) by using the two given points $$(3,-2)$$ and $$(8,1)$$.
$$m$$ $$=$$ (1 - $$(-2))$$ / (8 - 3) $$=$$ (1 + 2) / $$5$$ $$=$$ $$ rac{3}{5}$$

Step 2: Use point-slope form (y - y₁) $$=$$ m(x - x₁) with one of the points, say $$(3,-2)$$.
$$y$$ - $$(-2)$$ $$=$$ (3/5)(x - 3)
...
